original_text:
he gave them the lands of the nations,
    and they fell heir to what others had toiled for—
korean_text: 여러 나라의 땅을 그들에게 주시며 민족들이 수고한 것을 소유로 가지게 하셨으니

sentences.original_text: he gave them the lands of the nations
and they fell heir to what others had toiled for
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 다른 사람들이 수고한 것을 상속받았다
